name: NuMetroComingSoon-SouthAfrica
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Brushing your teeth and have 30 seconds to spare? Waiting for that popcorn to pop? We won't take long to tell you about one of the movies coming up this week in South Africa!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
